WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description: I've made an attempt at some basic Win8/TS project templates (http://sellsbrothers.com/Posts/Details/12724), but a full set of project and item templates would be great. The lack of an item template to even add a TypeScript file to anything except a C# Web project is a bummer.
WorkItem.Summary: Win8 project and item templates would be great

Comments.Message: That would a great Thing, to have in VS 2012 Express for Windows 8 a full set of TypeScript template app.
